qualifications.item: Extensive real-world customer experiences in enterprise architecture and global infrastructures.
Proven track record of success in identifying key improvement opportunities to optimize processes.
Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to develop easy rapport with others while building trust.
Success driven, passionate, and committed to excellence, high standards, and customer satisfaction.

work.item: Presented and articulated Tanium product features and benefits to prospects, while identifying other opportunities within Tanium.
Recreate, track, and verify software defects in the field or under lab conditions reported by customers.
Held multiple SME roles to understand what can be improved across products.
Created interim solutions utilizing a combination of technologies until made available in the product.
100% Renewal rate with accounts.
Provided pre-sales technical/functional support for Security Tools to Enterprise Accounts and successfully assisted multi-million dollar deals to continuously increase CrashPlan revenue.
Provided solution architecture and recommendations to prospects, and created demos and complex proof of concepts as needed to help drive Code42 product selection.
Liaised between Code42 Product Management, Information Experience, Sales, Development, and strategic partners to continuously influence product design and messaging.
Designed and developed scripts to facilitate the automation of Legal Hold matters.
Collected relevant technical issue identification information and filter non-technical and technical issues.
Reviewed manuals, release notes, and patch documentation for possible issue resolution.
Successfully de-escalate frustrated clients effectively increasing comfort, trust and program visibility.
Cultivated relationships and liaised across all department levels, earning recognition as the “go-to” SME.
Successfully grew premium service from 10 pilot users to 3K+ franchised financial advisors.
Coordinated 10-man team’s technical activities to ensure adherence to standards of best practice and data integrity.
Designed and implemented campus-wide Windows 7 migration tool streamlining performance and reducing cost.
Provided on-site and remote hardware and software support and implemented leading edge end-user systems.
Analyzed end user system architecture, developed and executed methods to test and integrate end user systems with standard infrastructure technologies.
Provided basic planning and design of key enterprise systems, monitored performance and performed maintenance.
Conferenced with main IT developers to discuss requirements on new business portals.
Selected for identifying key points and handling procedures to decommission failing assets system.
Performed code reviews, software upgrades and implementations, and database admin tasks.

education.degree: 110 Credits, Bachelor of Arts, Computer Science
education.name: Metropolitan State University
